content.description: The writer wants the tone of sentence 13 (reproduced below) to convey the emotional turmoil experienced by people who participated in the experiment.
content.question: Many subjects did not turn Nao off or were unsure whether to do so.Which of the following versions of the underlined text best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: thought turning Nao off might be wrong, and some did not do it
found the question of whether to turn Nao off a bit troubling
refused to turn Nao off or struggled with the decision

content.answer: refused to turn Nao off or struggled with the decision

skill.text: Skill 8.A: Strategically use words, comparisons, and syntax to convey a specific tone or style in an argument.
